EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / Michael Clark (1339777036.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Michael Clark (1339777036.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - Consultant Services Email - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 HI Mike, Sounds good. Just an FYI you do not need to mail the paperwork, you can send the I-9 form via email or fax. Please let me know if you have any additional questions. Thanks!Sara From: Mike [mailto:mclark475@gmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, June 12, 2012 4:30 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: MBO Partners / Michael Clark Hi Sara, Thank you so much for touching base. I am neglectful in putting the final paperwork in place with MBO. I actually got it done last week, but was distracted by other items---correction---I allowed myself the distraction. I will look at your resources and have my final documentation in the mail to you tomorrow. Thank you, Mike Clark From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]> Sent: Tuesday, June 12, 2012 3:49 PM To: mclark475@gmail.com <mailto:mclark475@gmail.com> Subject: MBO Partners / Michael Clark Hello Michael, I wanted to touch base as a courtesy and see how the contract search is going. We have a number of consultant resources that we continually update that you may find helpful. You may find them here: http://www.mbopartners.com/resources <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0xOTMmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTE5MyZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODgxNTYmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4MjcyNTAmZW1haWxpZD1tY2xhcms0NzVAZ21haWwuY29tJnVzZXJpZD1sLTEyOC0xMjg1MS0xMTAyNDQ0JmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsX56uwvXaOylMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsBlI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>. In addition, if you have any suggestions for new resources that might help other consultants - please let us know! Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you. Regards,Sara___________________________________Sara CondeConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703-793-6028f: 703.793.6081e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0xOTMmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTE5MyZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODgxNTYmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4MjcyNTAmZW1haWxpZD1tY2xhcms0NzVAZ21haWwuY29tJnVzZXJpZD1sLTEyOC0xMjg1MS0xMTAyNDQ0JmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsX56uwvXaOylMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsBlI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>
